name: [GGJ2023]TadpoleHair
description:
Rules:

1. Set tadpoles into the head as many as possible

2.Don't throw the tadpole to the ground, which will alarm the consumer

Control:

Press Q and W: Switch Action Type

Click Left Mouse Button: Do Action (Licking or Giving birth to tadpoles)

Members:

GameDesign: @JoshuaRabbit , @ManuelKomnenos , @RuimengG

GameArt: @RuimengG (Main), @ManuelKomnenos (UI,Font), @JoshuaRabbit (Animation)

Programming: @JoshuaRabbit

SoundEffect: @JoshuaRabbit

Music: from OpenGameArt
